de.desy.language.snl.ui.editor
Class SNLPresentationDamager

java.lang.Object
  de.desy.language.snl.ui.editor.SNLPresentationDamager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPresentationDamager
public class SNLPresentationDamager
extends Object
implements IPresentationDamager

This class determines the region of the document to refresh after a character was typed or removed. For SNL this is the part of the text starting at the last ';' or '{' before the current position and ending with ';' or '}' ignoring all declared (single line) comments, (single line) embedded C statements, strings or chars. If the position of the cursor is inside of one of them only this region is refreshed.

Author:
C1 WPS / KM
